mapper.select: SELECT SMOL.USER_ID AS USER_ID ,SMOL.ORGAN_CODE AS SCHOOL_CODE ,STHI.DENTAL_HOSPITAL_NM AS SCHOOL_NAME ,DATE_FORMAT(SMOL.MEASURE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS MEASURE_DT FROM ST_MEASURE_ORGAN_LOG SMOL LEFT OUTER JOIN ST_DENTAL_HOSPITAL_INFO STHI ON SMOL.ORGAN_CODE = STHI.DENTAL_HOSPITAL_CD WHERE 1=1 AND USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT SCI.SCHOOL_CODE AS SCHOOL_CODE ,SSI.SCHOOL_NAME AS SCHOOL_NAME ,SCI.CLASS_CODE AS CLASS_CODE ,SCI.CLASS_NAME AS CLASS_NAME FROM ST_CLASS_INFO SCI LEFT OUTER JOIN ST_SCHOOL_INFO SSI ON SCI.SCHOOL_CODE = SSI.SCHOOL_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND SCI.SCHOOL_CODE = #{organCode} ORDER BY SSI.SCHOOL_CODE ASC, CLASS_CODE ASC

SELECT DENTAL_HOSPITAL_ID, DENTAL_HOSPITAL_CD, DENTAL_HOSPITAL_NM, DENTAL_HOSPITAL_EMAIL, DENTAL_HOSPITAL_TEL_NO, DENTAL_HOSPITAL_COUNTRY, DENTAL_HOSPITAL_SIDO_NM, DENTAL_HOSPITAL_SIGUNGU_NM, DENTAL_HOSPITAL_EUPMYEONDONG_NM, DENTAL_HOSPITAL_LOGO_IMG, DENTAL_HOSPITAL_SEQ_NO FROM ST_DENTAL_HOSPITAL_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND DENTAL_HOSPITAL_CD = #{dentalHospitalCd}
SELECT SCHOOL_CODE ,SCHOOL_NAME FROM ST_SCHOOL_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND IS_VISIBLE = 'Y'

SELECT SMOL.USER_ID AS USER_ID ,SMOL.ORGAN_CODE AS SCHOOL_CODE ,SSI.SCHOOL_NAME AS SCHOOL_NAME ,DATE_FORMAT(SMOL.MEASURE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS MEASURE_DT FROM ST_MEASURE_ORGAN_LOG SMOL LEFT OUTER JOIN ST_SCHOOL_INFO SSI ON SMOL.ORGAN_CODE = SSI.SCHOOL_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND SMOL.USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT SCHOOL_CODE ,SCHOOL_NAME ,ORGAN_SIDO_NM ,ORGAN_SIGUNGU_NM ,ORGAN_EUPMYEONDONG_NM ,IS_VISIBLE ,USER_SEQ_NO FROM ST_SCHOOL_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND SCHOOL_CODE = #{schoolCode}

SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS SEQ ,SCHOOL_CODE ,SCHOOL_NAME ,CONCAT(ORGAN_SIDO_NM, ' ', ORGAN_SIGUNGU_NM, ' ', ORGAN_EUPMYEONDONG_NM) AS ORGAN_ADDRESS FROM ST_SCHOOL_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND (@ROWNUM:=0)=0
AND SCHOOL_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{schoolName}, '%')
ORDER BY SCHOOL_NAME ASC

SELECT SCI.SCHOOL_CODE AS SCHOOL_CODE ,SSI.SCHOOL_NAME AS SCHOOL_NAME ,SCI.CLASS_CODE AS CLASS_CODE ,SCI.CLASS_NAME AS CLASS_NAME FROM ST_CLASS_INFO SCI LEFT OUTER JOIN ST_SCHOOL_INFO SSI ON SCI.SCHOOL_CODE = SSI.SCHOOL_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND SCI.SCHOOL_CODE = #{schoolCode} ORDER BY SCI.CLASS_CODE ASC

SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS SEQ ,SCHOOL_CODE ,SCHOOL_NAME ,CONCAT(ORGAN_SIDO_NM, ' ', ORGAN_SIGUNGU_NM, ' ', ORGAN_EUPMYEONDONG_NM) AS ORGAN_ADDRESS FROM ST_SCHOOL_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND (@ROWNUM:=0)=0
AND SCHOOL_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchData}, '%')
AND SCHOOL_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchData}, '%')
ORDER BY SCHOOL_CODE ASC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(STM.MEASURE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS MEASURE_DT FROM ST_TEETH_MEASURE STM LEFT OUTER JOIN ST_STUDENT_USER_DETAIL SSUD ON STM.USER_ID = SSUD.USER_ID WHERE 1=1 AND SSUD.TEACHER_ID = ( SELECT CLASS_CODE FROM ST_CLASS_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND SCHOOL_CODE = #{schoolCode} LIMIT 1 ) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(STM.MEASURE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(STM.MEASURE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') DESC
SELECT CLASS_NAME FROM ST_STUDENT_USER_DETAIL STUD LEFT OUTER JOIN ST_CLASS_INFO SCI ON STUD.TEACHER_ID = SCI.CLASS_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND STUD.USER_ID = #{userId}
